headline: FIS HORIZON Recognized With XCelent Award for Advanced Technology, Empowering Community Banks to Compete
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., December 12, 2024--FIS® (NYSE: FIS), a global leader in financial technology, has announced today that its community banking core banking platform HORIZON has been recognized by Celent in its annual XCelent Awards program. The solution won the Advanced Technology category, a testament to how FIS drives deposit growth and wallet share for its clients through core platforms of unparalleled agility, customizability, and scalability.
